casebody.data:
No. 1116,

Misc.

Cradle v. Peyton, Penitentiary Superintendent. Albert Teich, Jr., for petitioner. Robert Y. Button, Attorney General of Virginia, and Reno S. Harp HI, Assistant Attorney General, for respondent.

Sup. Ct. App. Va. Certiorari denied.

Mr. Justice Douglas is of the opinion that certiorari should be granted.
